name: BabeStation (Demo)
description:
You're a human diplomat on a special mission! Capture the hearts of the Babe Station inhabitants for a date night in the stars! 

Demo Note: This was originally a Game Jam game so it's unfinished but we wanted to release this demo and get feedback! So please, feel free to leave comments about what you loved about Babe Station and maybe one day we can develop it into a full game!
**NOW ALSO SUPPORTING MAC!

Game Makers:
RustNuttie, Mischanima, Manders, Paxsatz, JerseyGundam, SonicMoustache and BurntAliveLion
